channel.title: CVE Feed for Credova Financial -- Credova_Financial
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Credova Financial -- Credova_Financial

item.title: CVE-2021-39342|2024-08-04T02:06:42.322Z -- credova%20financial -- credova_financial
item.description: The Credova_Financial WordPress plugin discloses a site's associated Credova API account username and password in plaintext via an AJAX action whenever a site user goes to checkout on a page that has the Credova Financing option enabled. This affects versions up to, and including, 1.4.8.
